channel.description: Global session and authentication policies Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: Summary overview of the different types of policy that combine to form an authentication ruleset Global session policy Authentication policy Enrollment policy Links to original docs: First section in Configure a global session policy and authentication policies: https://developer.
